body_html: I think it'd be generally a good idea for us to pave the wheel-building codepath. Users can very easily, without our intervention, get stripped down builds by, for example, specifying only the architectures they care about. It will be much harder to omit backward kernels, however.
body_text: I think it'd be generally a good idea for us to pave the wheel-building codepath. Users can very easily, without our intervention, get stripped down builds by, for example, specifying only the architectures they care about. It will be much harder to omit backward kernels, however.
body: I think it'd be generally a good idea for us to pave the wheel-building codepath. Users can very easily, without our intervention, get stripped down builds by, for example, specifying only the architectures they care about. It will be much harder to omit backward kernels, however.
